document_data.caption: A map showing Fenton in southern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Fenton
document_data.mainbody: '''Fenton''' was a small coastal town located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Fenton was located in southern Gwynneth in the far western reaches of the kingdom of [[Corwell]]. Fenton sat long the western edge of the [[Meirig Peatlands]] on the coast of [[Corwell Firth]].
